name: Precious Memory, Himmel
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, this card gets +1500 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck."
【AUTO】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] When your other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to your hand.
flavor_text: So you won't be alone in the future.

name: "Homeland Flower" Frieren & Himmel
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(3) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Reason to Go on a Journey, Himmel
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, put up to 1 card from the top of your clock into your waiting room, and you may pay the cost. If you paid the cost, choose up to 1 "Reason to Go on a Journey, Frieren" in your hand, and put it in any position of your stage.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Eternal Love" is in your climax area, you have 5 or less cards in your hand, and you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, put the bottom 3 cards of your opponent's deck into their waiting room, and deal 2 damage to your opponent X times. X is equal to the number of climax among those cards. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Take my hand, Frieren.

name: "The Party of Heroes" Himmel
ability: 【ACT】 [(1) 【REST】 2 of your characters] Put the top 3 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters put into your waiting room by this effect.

name: "Blowing a Kiss" Frieren
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.

name: "Flamme's Top Apprentice" Frieren
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 event in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Do you wish I knew you better?

name: "Corrupt Priest" Heiter
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 of your opponent's characters with level higher than your opponent's level, and put it into their stock.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)
flavor_text: I haven't had anything to drink.

name: "Strongest Warrior" Eisen
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +8000 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets the following abilities until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【CONT】 During your opponent's turn, this card gets +2000 power." "【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, the character facing this card gets -1 soul."
flavor_text: Keep getting back up and hitting them.

name: Reason to Go on a Journey, Frieren
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters get +1500 power.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, look at up to 2 cards from the bottom of your opponent's deck, choose up to 2 cards from among them, put them at the bottom of their deck in any order, and put the rest into their waiting room.
flavor_text: They gave me the courage to travel and taught me the joy of spending time with friends.

name: Tired of Waiting, Eisen
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power.
【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may move this card to the open middle position of your center stage.

name: "The Party of Heroes" Heiter
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During the turn that this card is placed on the stage from your hand, when this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 2 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "The Party of Heroes" Frieren
ability: 【CONT】 【CXCOMBO】 If "A Mere Ten-Year Adventure" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, your other ""Homeland Flower" Frieren & Himmel" and ""The Party of Heroes" Heiter" and ""The Party of Heroes" Eisen" in all of your zones get in the trigger icon.

【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top or at the bottom of your deck or into your waiting room, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: "Hero's Sword" Himmel
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw 1 card.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level X or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. X is equal to the number of "Reason to Go on a Journey, Himmel" in your waiting room.
flavor_text: So I decided I'd prove him wrong by becoming a real hero.

name: "The Party of Heroes" Eisen
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》, this card gets +3000 power.

name: Statue of the Party of Heroes
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot attack.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets -1000 power until end of turn.

The village chief won it all.
His skills were out of this world.

ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to that character's level ×500.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, choose 2 cards in your hand, and put them into your waiting room.
flavor_text: It's been ten years, huh?

name: "Warrior" Eisen
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 4 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +4500 power.
flavor_text: It's over.

name: What You Feel Like Today, Himmel
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another "Pursuit of Magic, Frieren" in your back stage, this card gets +6000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, during that attack, perform a trigger check 2 times on the trigger step."
flavor_text: You feel like eating Merkur pudding today, don't you?

name: Our Adventure
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【CHOICE】: When this card triggers, you may choose a character with 【SOUL】 in its trigger icon in your waiting room, and return it to your hand or put it into your stock)

name: Era Meteor Shower
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +2 soul.
flavor_text: Frieren: "I know a place where you can see them more clearly. I'll take you there in fifty years."

name: "Mage" Frieren
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character at the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: I should get going, too.

name: Request, Heiter
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other ""Learning Mage" Fern" get +2000 power.

【AUTO】 Bond/""Learning Mage" Fern" "New Year's Celebration, Fern" [Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 ""Learning Mage" Fern" or "New Year's Celebration, Fern" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: In that case, I have a request.

name: Blue Moon Weeds, Himmel
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put 1 card from your hand into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, if your memory has 2 or less cards, choose up to 1 "Blue Moon Weeds, Himmel" in your waiting room, and put it into your memory.
flavor_text: It's a flower that grows in my homeland. It's beautiful.

name: "Learning Mage" Fern
flavor_text: Are you looking for something?

name: Cleanup Request, Frieren
ability: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 1 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Taking Care of Her Master, Fern
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, this card gets +4000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)
flavor_text: She's still asleep.

name: Frieren the Slayer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to 3 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, if "Promised Blue Moon Weeds" is in your climax area, and you have 2 or more other 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 4 damage to your opponent, choose 1 of your 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. (Damage may be canceled)

name: New Year's Celebration, Fern
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this card gets +2000 power and the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may deal 1 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Ms. Frieren, it's so beautiful.

name: Defensive Magic
ability: 【COUNTER】 If you have 5 or more 《Adventurer》 or 《Magic》 characters, choose 1 character in battle, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【CONT】 This card cannot deal damage to a player."
Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: So the best option is to cast it in select locations.

name: Promised Blue Moon Weeds
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: I figured they'd be here, but I wasn't expecting so many.
